header.banner: Get new referral links every month

supportMeCard.title: Unlock Exclusive Deals with My Referral Codes!
supportMeCard.description: Discover a curated collection of referral codes for Meta Quest devices, games, and apps, updated monthly. Whether you’re looking to save on your next VR adventure or unlock special discounts, my site has you covered. Support my journey and grab amazing deals while you’re at it!

referralLinksApps.saveUpTo: Save up to {bestDeal}% on your next purchase!
referralLinksApps.useMyReferralLink: Use my referral link to buy <Bold>{title}</Bold> and you can get <Bold>{discount}</Bold>% off your purchase
referralLinksApps.stepTwo: Wait until I follow you back

referralLinksDevices.getCredit: Get a ${credit} credit with your purchase
referralLinksDevices.useMyReferralLink: you'll receive <Bold>${credit}</Bold> in promotional Quest cash when you use this referral link to purchase a <Bold>{device}</Bold> device.
referralLinksDevices.stepOne: <CreateAcount>create a Meta account</CreateAcount> or <LogIn>log In</LogIn> and <ReferralLink>Click the referral link</ReferralLink>.
referralLinksDevices.stepThree: Activate your <Bold>{device}</Bold> to get <Bold>${credit}</Bold> in Quest credit.

newsLetter.title: Join my newsletter to stay updated on the latest referral codes for apps and Meta Quest devices
